comments.author: atoll@mozilla.com
comments.creator: atoll@mozilla.com
comments.text: specifically to ensure that Firefox/Fennec/Home all sync bookmarks with unicode-in-all-fields correctly (at least: url, title, tags).
comments.raw_text: specifically to ensure that Firefox/Fennec/Home all sync bookmarks with unicode-in-all-fields correctly (at least: url, title, tags).

We shouldn't constrain this to just bookmarks, history and tabs can have unicode in their data as well.

Crossweave doesn't test Firefox Home.
comments.author: philipp@weitershausen.de
comments.creator: philipp@weitershausen.de
comments.text:

comments.author: atoll@mozilla.com
comments.creator: atoll@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: Whether or not this is still relevant, it's clearly not :)
comments.text: Whether or not this is still relevant, it's clearly not :)

I think this would still valuable to have, so reopening to get it back on our radar. I'm sorry we didn't get to this sooner. Sync didn't have a dedicated team for quite some time, but we formed one about two years ago, and have been regularly triaging bugs since. We're almost through January 2013, but there's still a long tail of untriaged bugs from 2010 to 2012.
comments.creator: lina@yakshaving.ninja
